jedi:tentaclejuice.NAME: Tentacle Juice
DESCRIPTIONS: A debuff that deals damage at the end of creature's turn. If the enemy is constricted, it will do its move first and then take damage from constriction.

jedi:hoardpotion.NAME: Hoard Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Add all cards from current card reward screen to your deck.
Upgrade all cards from current card reward screen and add them to your deck.

jedi:mysterypotion.NAME: Mystery Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: The next room you can go to, other than bosses, becomes a #y? room. NL Cannot be used in #yThe #yEnding.

jedi:wingpotion.NAME: Red Bull
DESCRIPTIONS: You may ignore paths when choosing the next room to travel to once.
